isis.stitle: International® DT 466E, DT 466, 530, 530E, and HT 530 Diesel Engines - Power Cylinders - Clean, Inspect, and Test

warning.para: To avoid serious personal injury or possible death, wear safety glasses with side shields when using compressed air for cleaning to reduce the danger from flying debris. Limit the air pressure to 207 kPa (30 psi).

note.para: Do not use a caustic solution on engine or related components.

svcproc.title: Clean Connecting Rod, Piston, and Rings

step1.para: Clean aluminum pistons using a soap and water solution. Soak and clean piston with non-metallic brush.

caution.para: To avoid possible engine damage, never use wire brush for cleaning aluminum pistons.

step1.para: Clean all piston ring grooves thoroughly.

note.para: Make sure two oil drains in aluminum piston oil ring grooves are open.

step1.para: Clean piston rings, piston pins, piston pin retainers and connecting rods components using suitable solvent.
Clean all rod bolt holes and threads thoroughly.
Clean oil hole at top of rod. Make sure it is not blocked.
